thread.title: Real or Fantasy: The Astros Are Really Good

author: Michael Salfino
title: Real or Fantasy: The Astros Are Really Good
text:
The Major League Baseball season is set to begin, with the defending World Series champion Houston Astros favored to repeat. If fantasy baseball is an accurate gauge for reality, the Astros should coast to another title.
With a stacked roster that includes second baseman Jose Altuve, who has an average draft position, or ADP, of 2.1, shortstop Carlos Correa (15.4), outfielder George Springer (32), third basemen Alex Bregman (32.3) and pitcher Justin Verlander (40.2), Astros players are a trendy pick in fantasy drafts.
...
